import { useState } from "react" const NewManga = (props) => { const [newManga, setNewManga] = useState({ title: '', image: '', link: '', totalChapters: null, currentChapters: null, }) const [mangalist] = useState(props.mangaList) const imageStandBy = (event) => { event.target.src = 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/14/No_Image_Available.jpg' } return(
) } export default NewManga
